00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup USART_Examples USART
00038   * @{
00039   */
00040 
00041 /** @addtogroup Retarget
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00047 #define GET_MS()  (u32)TIME_TICK2MS(Time_GetTick())
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00051 #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00052 ErrStatus WaitLSEClockReady(u32 uTimeout_ms);
00053 ErrStatus HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_TypeDef CLKSRC, u32 uTimeout_ms);
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00057 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00058   * @brief  Main program.
00059   * @retval None
00060   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00061 int main(void)
00062 {
00063   int input;
00064 
00065   #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00066   Time_Init();
00067   if (WaitLSEClockReady(2000) == ERROR)
00068   {
00069     #if 1
00070     // Wait for LSE clock Ready timeout, do the error handling here
00071     while(1);
00072     #endif
00073   }
00074 
00075   if (HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_LSE, 2000) == ERROR)
00076   {
00077     #if 1
00078     // Wait for HSI Auto Trim Ready timeout, do the error handling here
00079     while(1);
00080     #endif
00081   }
00082   #endif
00083 
00084   { /* Enable peripheral clock of Rx GPIO                                                                   */
00085     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00086     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_CLK = 1;
00087     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00088   }
00089 
00090   /* Turn on UxART Rx internal pull up resistor to prevent unknow state                                     */
00091   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_UP);
00092 
00093   RETARGET_Configuration();
00094 
00095   /* Send "Hello World!" string 10 times                                                                    */
00096   for (input = 0; input < 10; input++)
00097   {
00098     printf("Hello World! %d\r\n", (int)input);
00099   }
00100 
00101   /* Get Rx character and and print out                                                                     */
00102   while (1)
00103   {
00104     printf("Please input key for printf....");
00105     input = getchar();
00106     printf("\r\nYour input is %c[0x%x]\r\n\r\n", input, input);
00107   }
00108 }
00109 
00110 #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00111 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00112   * @brief  Wait LSE Clock Ready
00113   * @retval None
00114   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00115 ErrStatus WaitLSEClockReady(u32 uTimeout_ms)
00116 {
00117   u32 start=GET_MS();
00118 
00119   while (CKCU_GetClockReadyStatus(CKCU_FLAG_LSERDY) == RESET)
00120   {
00121     if (GET_MS() - start > uTimeout_ms)
00122     {
00123       return ERROR;
00124     }
00125   }
00126 
00127   return SUCCESS;
00128 }
00129 
00130 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00131   * @brief  Auto Trim by LSE configuration.
00132   * @retval None
00133   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00134 ErrStatus HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_TypeDef CLKSRC, u32 uTimeout_ms)
00135 {
00136   u32 start;
00137   CKCU_HSIAutoTrimClkConfig(CLKSRC);
00138   CKCU_HSIAutoTrimCmd(ENABLE);
00139 
00140   start=GET_MS();
00141   if (uTimeout_ms != 0)
00142   {
00143     while (CKCU_HSIAutoTrimIsReady() == FALSE)
00144     {
00145       if (GET_MS() - start > uTimeout_ms)
00146       {
00147          return ERROR;
00148       }
00149     }
00150   }
00151 
00152   return SUCCESS;
00153 }
00154 #endif
00155 
00156 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00157 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00158   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00159   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00160   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00161   * @retval None
00162   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00163 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00164 {
00165   /*
00166      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00167      Debug message can be added here.
00168      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00169   */
00170 
00171   while (1)
00172   {
00173   }
00174 }
00175 #endif
